name: MenuPlan
0:
”Alexa, open Menu Plan”
”Alexa, ask Menu Plan what's for dinner”
”Alexa, ask Menu Plan what are we having for breakfast tomorrow”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: menu plan
des:
Activate this skill if you are using Menu Plan on your iOS devices.
You will be able to get info about your Menu Plan meals from the Alexa app.
